CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Karel Jungwiert;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger;Volodymyr Butkevych;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and resides in the town of FAC , GPE region , GPE .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the applicant instituted CARDINAL separate sets of proceedings in FAC against his employer , a ORG - owned company , ORG ( NORP управління будівництва ) , for salary arrears and other payments .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE the court found for the applicant and awarded him a total of CARDINAL NORP hryvnyas ( ORG ) . On DATE the court dismissed the applicant ’s third claim as time - barred .
CARDINAL . In DATE the Zhovti Vody ORG initiated enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . The applicant received UAH CARDINAL , but the remainder of the awards remains unpaid .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG liquidated the debtor enterprise and the writs of enforcement were transferred to the liquidation commission .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
